content.rendered: Hey everyone! Today I just wanted to share a photo of a recent play test of Dagers High. I’ll unpack more of it tomorrow, but overall it seems like the Sophomore and Junior decks could be a bit stronger as it seemed disproportionally harder to get A’s in both of those years (and this has been fairly consistent throughout play tests). I kept track of the number of A’s this time per player, and it went from a 3/3/4 split Freshman year to 2/1/3 to 2/4/2 to finally 3/4/3 Senior year.  Let me know what you think in the comments!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Sophomore deck changes
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Today we will be discussing a few of the changes with the Sophomore deck. Sophomore year was designed to be reflective of sophomore year at my school: more difficult classes and less support. Even though the Sophomore deck has a lot more total action points than the Freshman…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Adjusting Cards (Part Six)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hello everyone! Here is another installment of the adjusting cards series.   This card has been changed before recently, but I still wasn't happy with the results. This card doesn't do anything if the player who has the most clubs takes it. In addition, at +1 it was very strong,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Another play test photo
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Today will be a short post to go over a recent play test. The whole play test took a bit over 2 hours (I have it written down as 2 hours 44 minutes, but there was a meal break in between) for 3 players. 2 of the players…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Straight A Bonuses
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! After the changes to Integrity and a couple of the classes, a new player board was in order. English II and PreCalculus now give +5 Teacher Influence instead of +4. The Integrity Track now does not have any RP symbols on it. TOP Physics and TOP Biology swapped…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Character Boards
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Today I have something special to show you all. jetpack-related-posts.title: Massive update
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Lot's of stuff has been happening recently, and so I thought I'd fill everyone in on what's going on! Firstly some playtest photos:   Yep, that's right- a new teacher board! In addition, the card art is now 100% complete, colored, upscaled, and at acceptable resolution. One of…
